query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.status=1 and est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and (est.mainrejecttimes is null or est.mainrejecttimes=0)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_netdata est where est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@'

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.status=1 and est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and (est.mainrejecttimes is null or est.mainrejecttimes=0)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_netdata est where est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and (est.mainrejecttimes is null or est.mainrejecttimes=0) and est.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@'

select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_netdata est where est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.mainrejecttimes>0 and est.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@'
